Bran Van 3000 singer Moraille takes aim at political office
Stephane Moraille speaks to the media supported by NDP MP's Pierre Nantel (left to right) Rosane Dore Lefebvre and Paulina Ayala in Montreal, Tuesday, August 20, 2013. Lawyer and singer Stephane Moraille of the group Bran Van 3000, will try to win the ...
